evidence.claim: Simpliphy utilizes AWS for hosting and cloud services.
The platform adheres to HIPAA compliance for protecting patient information.
Simpliphi supports X12 transaction sets for EDI.
Simpliphy implements FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Integration with EHRs is supported through modern REST APIs.
The company uses Heroku for application deployment.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or API use cases found on their site.
